category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_map_legacy_ebs_properties
preference.preference_description: Manage (create and update) the EBS_DatasetUid and EBS_DatasetLastVersion properties in a CATIA document during Save and Load processes. Possible values: - True: The EBS_DatasetUid and EBS_DatasetLastVersion are managed. - False: The EBS_DatasetUid and EBS_DatasetLastVersion are removed.
